title: The Knob (Greene County, New York)
text: The Knob is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in <a href="Greene%20County%2C%20New%20York">Greene County, New York</a>. It is located in the <a href="Catskill%20Mountains">Catskill Mountains</a> north-northeast of <a href="Ashland%2C%20Greene%20County%2C%20New%20York">Ashland</a>. <a href="Ashland%20Pinnacle">Ashland Pinnacle</a> is located north, and <a href="Huntersfield%20Mountain">Huntersfield Mountain</a> is located northwest of The Knob.
